column1: Little Goat Diner////The hubs went with the beef burger made wing style.  Wing sauce
column2: blue cheese & celery topped with crispy string onions on fat potato bun.  It's served ala carte so that's all there was; a burger
column3: no fries.  The man was a little bummed bout fries being extra.  While there's a lot of diner vibe reverberating in the atmosphere
column4: diner prices is not one of them.
